title: Is Dark Star Cho'Gath ever coming back?
body:
Sorry, this question has probably been asked to death.

Last year, when Dark Star Cho was out, I was too poor to buy it, and from what I've read, it's coming back as a gemstone skin. Does anyone have any news regarding that, or if it's been changed? It's an amazing skin, and I'm pretty annoyed that I couldn't get it since Cho'Gath is one of my favourite champions.

Thanks.

replies.body: it was a make a wish skin so its part of legacy so yes it might come back out on its aniversary or some event but all is unknown
